name: HTNRG - Flag Chasing [Hattrick NewD]
description:
/*
 * HTNRG - Flag Chasing [Hattrick NewD]
 * 
 * Author      : _eNeRGy_ (7397517)
 * Created     : 09/2009
 * Version     : 4.0
 * Website     : url(http://nrgjack.altervista.org/)
 *
 */ 

/* 
 * ******************
 * * USER GUIDE 4.0 *
 * ******************
 *
 * with this style you can add a style to a line in the league 
 * list in challenge page.
 * you can use different style according to different flag cheasing level
 * 
 * The levels are 4
 * 1- BOTH MISSING (green)
 * 2- HOME MISSING (yellow)
 * 3- AWAY MISSING (red)
 * 4- completed (line through, and opacified)
 *  
 * In the style there is a list of code called ID-LIST, 
 * in that list each row contains the correct national ID 
 * and the name of the nation (commented).
 * When you play a friendly match you have to pick (select and copy) 
 * the corresponding line, go to the end of the page and paste 
 * the line just between the comment "begin paste here" and 
 * "end  paste here" .
 * the code looks like that : 
 * 
 * div[id*="CPMain_pnlPoolDDLs"]  select[id*="CPMain_ddlPoolLeagues"] 
 * option[value="1"] /*	Sverige			*/
 * 
 * you have to copy the line corresponding to the nation you played with 
 * and paste it in the corresponding region (1 or 2 or 3 or 4)
 * save and close ^_^
 * 
 * enjoy
 */

CHANGELOG:
v4.00 : fixed
v3.00 : changed id and user-guide ^_^
v2.00 : added line-through

-------------------

MORE STYLES HERE : http://www.nrgjack.altervista.org/wordpress/2010/04/13/stili-per-hattrick/

-------------------

************
** layout **
************
New Football Pitch [Hattrick NewD] 2.0 --> http://userstyles.org/styles/17117
Wide Hattrick (1280px) [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/16840
Colored Skills [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/13700
Transfers Search Result [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/17033

******************
**updated Skins **
******************
Skin : AeroTrick [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/28379
Skin : DarkTrick [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/16736
Skin : LighTrick [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/17144
Skin : AeroTrick2 [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/28703

************
** shirts **
************
New Shirts : Inter [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/15384
New Shirts : Juve [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/27983
New Shirts : Lazio [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/27977
New Shirts : Milan A.C. [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/13728
New Shirts : Palermo [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/13602
New Shirts : Roma [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/27978

**********
** misc **
**********
Flag Chasing (supp.only) [Hattrick NewD] --> http://userstyles.org/styles/19402
css:
/*
 * HTNRG - Flag Chasing [Hattrick NewD]
 * 
 * Author      : _eNeRGy_ (7397517)
 * Created     : 09/2009
 * Version     : 4.0
 * Website     : url(http://nrgjack.altervista.org/)
 *
 */ 

@-moz-document 
domain("hattrick.ws"),
domain("hattrick.interia.pl"),
domain("hattrick.uol.com.br"),
domain("hattrick.org") {

/* 
 * ******************
 * * USER GUIDE 4.0 *
 * ******************
 *
 * with this style you can add a style to a line in the league 
 * list in challenge page.
 * you can use different style according to different flag cheasing level
 * 
 * The levels are 4
 * 1- BOTH MISSING (green)
 * 2- HOME MISSING (yellow)
 * 3- AWAY MISSING (red)
 * 4- completed (line through, and opacified)
 *  
 * In the style there is a list of code called ID-LIST, 
 * in that list each row contains the correct national ID 
 * and the name of the nation (commented).
 * When you play a friendly match you have to pick (select and copy) 
 * the corresponding line, go to the end of the page and paste 
 * the line just between the comment "begin paste here" and 
 * "end  paste here" .
 * the code looks like that : 
 * 
 * div[id*="CPMain_pnlPoolDDLs"]  select[id*="CPMain_ddlPoolLeagues"] 
 * option[value="1"] ,
 * 
 * you have to copy the line corresponding to the nation you played with 
 * and paste it in the corresponding region (1 or 2 or 3 or 4)
 * save and close ^_^
 * 
 * enjoy
 */



/* ID-LIST */
div[id*="CPMain_pnlPoolDDLs"] select[id*="CPMain_ddlPoolLeagues"] option[value="128"]	/* Al Iraq   */ ,

/* ******************************************************************************************************* */

/* BEGIN PASTE HERE ************************************************************************************** */
